scripts.dev:hono: pnpm --filter db build && pnpm prepare:deploy && pnpm --filter=hono-api dev
scripts.test:integration:local:
# Requires 'pnpm local:start' to be run first
pnpm --filter integration-tests test:connection:local && pnpm --filter integration-tests test:local
scripts.test:integration:dev: pnpm --filter integration-tests test:connection:dev && pnpm --filter integration-tests test:dev
scripts.test:integration:prod: pnpm --filter integration-tests test:connection:prod && pnpm --filter integration-tests test:prod
scripts.api:start: pnpm --filter db build && pnpm prepare:deploy && pm2 start --name hono-api 'pnpm --filter=hono-api dev'
scripts.api:stop: pm2 stop hono-api && pm2 delete hono-api
